tool_description: It  provides a simple and efficient way to validate email addresses. It takes an email address as input and returns a response indicating whether the email address is valid, invalid, or Disposable in JSON formats
name: Email validation API
title: Email validation API

api_list.name: Verify an Email Address
api_list.description: send an email-id as input and returns an response indicating whether the email address is valid, invalid, or Disposable as JSON Formats

required_parameters.name: emailAddress
required_parameters.description: Full e-mail, or domain to check if valid or temporary/disposable. You can enter an e-mail address, and it will be converted to a domain, but entering just the domain is recommended for user privacy reasons.
